timeline.message: refactor: Change system controller to use ActionResponse.
test: Use parameterized tests, add a few, and make methods private.

timeline.bodyText: Are we sure we want to use a parameterized test here? It looks like we just want to create a start and end time list and iterate over it in the test. Parameterized tests will just make it harder to debug the test in my opinion.
timeline.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: This is what parameterized tests are meant for. I don't think we should change it
replies.author: jamesrichard91

replies.bodyText: Parameterized tests are expanded into individual tests where the input is shown as part of the test.
replies.author: psantos1113

replies.bodyText: Parameterized are meant for stuff like this, but ends up making things harder in my opinion. Why use a parameterized test when you can just pass the list yourself?
replies.author: bamandel
